name: Dual Spell
description:
A knight and A Ninja cursed by the queen under an imaginary world. They have to work together regardless of the differences and break the spell.

Movement

Use Left and Right Arrow Keys.

Use Space Bar to Jump

Spirals

Don't Get Caught up by the dark magic spirals. 

Control/Move The Knight

Hold T while Accessing the movement controls

Pause

Press ESCAPE KEY

Game Made during the Nairobi Global Game Jam. (Jan 28th to Jan 30th).
